conversations.body_text: I also did the ground work too it and it does not work soon I get into a game it shuts off

Hi Fly cutz 仅限，  ​   Please provide your order number so we can verify your pedal version.  Then, update to the latest version 2.1.2 of the software and test again after updating the firmware.  Also, make sure to connect the device directly to the rear USB 3.0 (blue) port of your computer and avoid using a USB hub to ensure stable power and communication.      https://www.simsonn.com/pages/download
Yes it’s plugged directly into the rear usb blue I tried others Sent from my iPhone

Hi Fly cutz Only，    Please make sure you are using SIMSONN Manager version 2.1.2. Then press and hold the upgrade button on the control box and reconnect the USB cable. At this point, SIMSONN Manager will indicate that the device has entered firmware upgrade mode.  Next, go to: Settings → Update → Manual Update Firmware → pedals → firmware → pedals-plusx.sfu, and select this file to update.  After the update is complete, please test the device again to ensure it is working properly.
